reviews.text: Great pizza, Sandwiches and salads.  We got a cheese pizza and a Hawaiian,  the meatball sandwich which was amazing and the kids macaroni and cheese and fries.  The Greek salad had a generous amount of feta and the pizzas had a good amount of cheese too. Lovely waitress.  Great service.  Clean restaurant.  We will be back!

After our daughter's softball game, our group of 35 (players and families) came here for dinner‚Äîand we were seriously impressed. The staff was incredibly kind and accommodating, and despite the size of our group, all the food came out quickly and was hot, fresh, and full of flavor. The sisters who own the restaurant were an absolute delight to work with. Great service, great food, and an overall awesome experience. Highly recommend!

We have been going to Fonta‚Äôs for years. The pizza is perfection and I have never gotten a piece of wilted or brown lettuce in their Greek salad. It‚Äôs always fresh and crisp! If you haven‚Äôt tried it, you are definitely missing out on great food.

The best of the best... in all the world.  We were raised on this pizza and salad...... it's a historical resteraunt.. please don't ever stop......love the olive oil crust instead of the tomato sauce üíïüíïüíïüíï

detailedReviews.author: Nikki Brigham
detailedReviews.text: As ALWAYS, the best dang pizza rolls ever! Everyone there is amazing, my order was up and ready for me really quickly, and handed over with a smile.

detailedReviews.author: Jen Armagost
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. Friendly staff, casual, cozy, relaxed atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Cidney Wooten
detailedReviews.text: After our daughter's softball game, our group of 35 (players and families) came here for dinner‚Äîand we were seriously impressed. The staff was incredibly kind and accommodating, and despite the size of our group, all the food came out quickly and was hot, fresh, and full of flavor. The sisters who own the restaurant were an absolute delight to work with. Great service, great food, and an overall awesome experience. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Peggy Norwood
detailedReviews.text: Family in town and our favorite Fontas what an amazing combo.

detailedReviews.author: Kendall Witcher
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Super fresh ingredients and all handmade!

detailedReviews.author: Penny Firestien
detailedReviews.text: From thier Greek salads, pizzas, Gyros and the absolute best cheese sticks around, you just cannot go wrong!!!! Troy and his family have worked so hard to make this one of the best places around!!!

detailedReviews.text:
This is the best pizza you‚Äôll ever eat!  And the Greek salad with their homemade dressing is bar none! The service is excellent and they have great specials!
My only complaint is they don‚Äôt open until 4!

detailedReviews.author: Berta Caciari
detailedReviews.text: We love Frances and we're getting ready to watch some World Series.Softball did a calling order for pick up.It was ready as they told us.The food is hot and delicious and as usual.The greek salad is top notch

detailedReviews.author: Mark Fauth
detailedReviews.text:
There are only a few northern Colorado-only pizza restaurants that are ALWAYS great and never fail. Fontas is the one in Greeley.

Go to favorite is a pepperoni and jalape√±os pizza  Of course you HAVE to have the Greek salad before hand.

This time was taken out, but always friendly service if dining in.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Bernal
detailedReviews.text: Finally found a pizza place that I like. The taste of the sausage and sauce is authentic. I would recommend this place to.anyone.

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Keeler
detailedReviews.text:
For as is the best pizzeria in town!
My husband knew the original owner and the knew owner has kept the tradition going through the original recipe.
Great food always!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Red Cloud
detailedReviews.text: The service was just as good as the food!! Very family friendly. Great place to take your littles?!

detailedReviews.author: BHDHZH Hammy (Hammys)
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was excellent. Service was excellent!! Definitely be back again next week.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Maguire
detailedReviews.text: Great dinner and service!!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: This place is hands down AMAZING. The service and the food are unlike anything I‚Äôve ever had. EVERYTHING is delicious and the people who own and work here are beyond friendly. We live 1 1/2 hours away, but made the drive and it‚Äôs so worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Gerri Stitt
detailedReviews.text: Love the.Mom & Pop atmosphere. Awesome pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Judy Scofield
detailedReviews.text: The pizza here is to die for!  Always the same!  Been coming here since high school, which is a looong time ago.  The gluten free pizza is fantastic!  Troy, Mr Fontas would be proud!

detailedReviews.author: Jordon Hopp
detailedReviews.text: The absolute best place for pizza with a family based environment with service that'll give you the home town feeling will always be my pizza spot!

detailedReviews.author: Sheila Lucero
detailedReviews.text: I'd give it an ALMOST 4. Decent enough people,  just not "fancy" or "proper."  It can be so much more with little effort. It wasn't what I expected. Over the years I have heard so much raving over this place. Compared to calzones around Greeley, Fort Collins, and Windsor, Fonta's has the best fillings, good sauce but not nearly enough, and desperately needs a re-do on their bread. It was like saltine crackers! Dry, thin, crispy, instead of doughy, fluffy, yummy. I even tried the twisted piece with honey at home, and there just was no glorifying it. Just absolute disappointment.  For nearly half the price, Brick Oven has better bread, good sauce, decent fillings- we just need more in there!

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Beth Roberts
detailedReviews.text: Fabulous.  I've been going there since i was little.  Love.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Stemm
detailedReviews.text: Great service

detailedReviews.author: Steve Hoffelt
detailedReviews.text: Took our grandchildren to our favorite local restaurant, Fontas Pizza and were treated with excellent service, terrific pizza, spaghetti, calzones and salads! For us, as it has been for 30 years, Fontas is the best of the best!

detailedReviews.author: Sheryl Luther
detailedReviews.text: The best of the best... in all the world.  We were raised on this pizza and salad...... it's a historical resteraunt.. please don't ever stop......love the olive oil crust instead of the tomato sauce üíïüíïüíïüíï

detailedReviews.author: travis orr
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around, been coming here for well over 20 years

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Miller
detailedReviews.text: Awesome customer service on the phone ordering, and also when I went to pick up our food!!! I recommend this restraunt 100%! Thanks again for the great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Diane Duran
detailedReviews.text:
This is what makes Greeley special. Pizza is always consistent with delicious ingredients.
Fun place to eat in.

detailedReviews.author: Trev Starr
detailedReviews.text: Great food and comfortable place to enjoy some pizza or salads. Good menu options

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Stone
detailedReviews.text: They were very busy! Seemed short staffed but everyone was friendly and we enjoyed a wonderful dinner.

detailedReviews.author: Dan Oleary
detailedReviews.text: We have been customers for a very long time. Love the People and Love the Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Idler
detailedReviews.text: Picked up takeout after ordering online. Best spaghetti in town.

detailedReviews.author: teresa nixon
detailedReviews.text: It's the best pizza place in town excellent service very clean restaurant and kid friendly

detailedReviews.author: Marlene Keberlein
detailedReviews.text: As always, pizza was so good.

detailedReviews.author: Rich Minjarez
detailedReviews.text:
Always a pleasure and the food is always fantastic!
I'll be back once a week?

detailedReviews.author: Juanita Gonzales
detailedReviews.text: I won a free pizza and arrived 30 minutes before closing time, but they gladly assisted me. The staff was very polite and right on time. When I got home, the food was so delicious! I haven't been able to eat at Fonta's due to their hours, but they certainly did not disappoint! Thanks for everything you guys!

detailedReviews.author: T J
detailedReviews.text: First time being here...... Was very satisfied. Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Ethan Chadwick
detailedReviews.text: Fonta's Pizza is exactly what a neighborhood pizzeria should be. The family running it puts their heart into every pie, and it shows - both in the delicious food and the warm service. Love the cozy, laid-back atmosphere that makes you want to stick around. This is how local pizza places used to be.

detailedReviews.author: Edward Alexander
detailedReviews.text: Best around!

detailedReviews.author: Carolyn Maltos
detailedReviews.text: Staff quick and friendly

detailedReviews.author: Geniel Burke
detailedReviews.text: Outstanding service and the food is wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Mann
detailedReviews.text: The best calzones!

detailedReviews.author: Beverly Ruibal
detailedReviews.text: Love our waitress and the best pizza ever

detailedReviews.author: Larry Madrid
detailedReviews.text: Great food & awesome service!

detailedReviews.author: Paula Call
detailedReviews.text: Love this place the owners are so nice and they work together really well. Order is always what I want the pizza rolls are so good.

detailedReviews.author: kathy ledford
detailedReviews.text: We always enjoy Fontas great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Chris S
detailedReviews.text: It's a hidden gem. The meatball sandwich is off the chain! And the Greek salad comes in three different sizes big bigger and share with the half of the restaurant ü§≠ awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Wayne Bomgardner
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza there is. Awesome staff. Treat us like family.

detailedReviews.author: Marita Samuels
detailedReviews.text: Awesome in every way!

detailedReviews.author: Rob Stodulski
detailedReviews.text: Our go to pizza in Greeley.  Always great quality and good tasting pizza.

detailedReviews.author: America McNeill de Jimenez
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite pizza, best service, gotta have the Greek salad!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Rainwater
detailedReviews.text: Everyone is so friendly the cooks are awesome especially Caden the servers are on top of everything the food is the best!!

detailedReviews.author: Ashlei Johnson (Ash)
detailedReviews.text: Mozzarella sticks are massive, pizza crust is lovely, and lots of high quality topping options. Little on the spendy side for those on a budget (~$50 including tip for a large pizza and app) but worth it when we're craving their mozzarella sticks. They also have a good deal now and then through their rewards program so definitely sign up and subscribe!

detailedReviews.author: roz zs
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, Sandwiches and salads.  We got a cheese pizza and a Hawaiian,  the meatball sandwich which was amazing and the kids macaroni and cheese and fries.  The Greek salad had a generous amount of feta and the pizzas had a good amount of cheese too. Lovely waitress.  Great service.  Clean restaurant.  We will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Linda Ghent
detailedReviews.text: Always great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Katie seamons
detailedReviews.text: We have visited Fontas a few times and loved the experience. In a Large group and also for take out. All the food was delicious and service friendly and efficient.

detailedReviews.author: Marla DeJohn
detailedReviews.text: A wonderful family owned restaurant. Delicious food and fun atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Marilyn Peters
detailedReviews.text:
Been coming here for 30 years. Always excellent food and service.
You gotta try this!!

detailedReviews.author: Valerie Andrade
detailedReviews.text: Always love Fontas pizza yummy üòä

detailedReviews.author: America McNeill de Jimenez

detailedReviews.text: The staff is very unfriendly,  except for the hostess. And the pizza is way overpriced.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the pizza for its perfectly cooked thin crust and unmatched sauce, making it a standout favorite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is celebrated for its friendly and accommodating service, even for large groups, ensuring a pleasant dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The Greek salad is consistently noted for its fresh and crisp ingredients, never wilted or brown, complementing the pizza offerings. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about the quality of the bread and overall disappointment with the food - review management can address this concern
Unfriendly staff, except for the hostess - review management can address this concern
Competition with other local pizza places offering better value - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
